video_prompt: A futuristic warrior's silver hair whips. Her blue eyes shift, scanning. Glowing blue elements on her mask and armor flicker and pulsate. A sheathed sword emits a bright blue glow, its light wavering. Blurred urban lights in the background drift, while red-orange glows pulsate and debris particles float.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Medium close-up of a futuristic female character, anime/video game style, over shoulder perspective. Silver wind-swept hair, piercing blue eyes with dark eyeliner, light freckles. Dark metallic face mask with glowing blue accents and rivets. Multiple ear piercings. Intricate dark metallic body armor with glowing blue lights. Sheathed sword on back with glowing blue hilt. Blurred dark urban night background with glowing lights and a red-orange neon sign. Dynamic, powerful, gritty, sci-fi.
refined_video_prompt: Warrior's silver hair whips dynamically. Her blue eyes subtly shift, scanning. Blue glowing elements across her mask and armor intensely flicker and pulsate. A sheathed sword's bright blue luminescence actively wavers. In the background, urban lights slowly drift, red-orange glows rhythmically pulsate, and debris particles gently float.
